member.name: T:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.AESHelper
member.summary: Klasse f端r die Ver-/Entschl端sselung von Strings mit AES

member.name: M:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.AESHelper.EncryptData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use AES to encrypt data string. The output string is the encrypted bytes as a base64 string. The same password must be used to decrypt the string.
member.param: Password used to encrypt the string.

member.name: M:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.AESHelper.DecryptData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypt the data string to the original string. The data must be the base64 string returned from the EncryptData method.
member.param: Encrypted data generated from EncryptData method.
Password used to decrypt the string.

member.name: T:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.BCryptHelper
member.summary: Klasse f端r die Ver-/Entschl端sselung von Strings mit BCrypt

member.name: M:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.BCryptHelper.GetBCryptHash(System.String)
member.summary: Erzeugt einen BCrypt-Hash eines Strings (OpenBSD-Schmema, generierter Salt)

member.name: M:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.HexEncoding.GetBytes(System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Creates a byte array from the hexadecimal string. Each two characters are combined to create one byte. First two hexadecimal characters become first byte in returned array. Non-hexadecimal characters are ignored.
member.param: string to convert to byte array
number of characters in string ignored
member.returns: byte array, in the same left-to-right order as the hexString

member.name: M:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.HexEncoding.InHexFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if given string is in proper hexadecimal string format

member.name: M:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.HexEncoding.IsHexDigit(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns true is c is a hexadecimal digit (A-F, a-f, 0-9)
member.returns: true if hex digit, false if not

member.name: M:Gandalan.IDAS.Crypto.HexEncoding.hexToByte(System.String)
member.summary: Converts 1 or 2 character string into equivalant byte value
